What we feed to our mind plays an important role in our journey of life. The following resources can aid your journey towards living life the mindful way.

Books (Mindfulness)

  • The Power of Now by Eckhart Tolle

Books (Psychology)

  • Thinking, fast and slow by Daniel Kahneman
  • Behave by Robert M Sapolsky

Books (History / Future)

  • Sapiens by Yuval Noah Harari
  • Home Deus by Yuval Noah Harari

Books (Indian Scriptures)

  • The Bhagavad Gita
  • Brihadaranyaka Upanishad

Mindfulness articles / videos

  • Introduction to mindfulness by Greater Good Science Center at UC Berkeley
  • How the brain changes when you meditate
  • Sam Harris and Yuval Noah Harari on special experiences during meditation & being in the present moment
  • Taoism, the art of not trying

Indian Scriptures

  • Alan Watts on non-duality
  • Taittriyaka Upanishad Full AudioBook
